snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Play Videos with AVPlayer (Ep 21)
snippet.description:
I hope everyone is excited to render the video files that we upload in the last episode.  In today's lesson, we'll go over how to use a couple of components from AVFoundation, namely AVPlayer and AVPlayerLayer, to play some video.  Along the way, I'll also show you guys how to provide some UI feedback that lets the user's know when the video is loading.  In addition, we'll be looking at how to take advantage of the cell recycle process to reset the UI.  Enjoy

Previous Episode 20:
https://youtu.be/eRkpdRDYGeM

All episodes for Firebase 3 series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0dzCUj1L5JEfHqwjBV0XFb9qx9cGXwkq

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/firebase-chat-messenger

Want to learn more about iOS Development? Here are a few additional playlist resources on my channel:
